programme.title: Ricky
programme.desc: When Katie, an ordinary woman, meets Paco, an ordinary man, something magical and miraculous happens: a love story. From this union will be born an extraordinary baby: Ricky.

programme.title: Murders in Pont-Aven
programme.desc: The bodies of two gallery owners are found. These murders are reminiscent of the death of Suzanne, a painter, 20 years ago. The investigation is led by Marion, Suzanne's daughter, and by Antoine who was in charge of the investigations at the time.

programme.title: Broll: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Gravedigger Max Broll and retired soccer star Baroni team up to find Max’s stepmother Tilda, the local police commissioner, who has been abducted and buried alive in the woods. The clock is ticking – Tilda won`t survive more than 48 hours underground.

programme.title: Copperman
programme.desc: Anselmo, an adult with the mental age of a child, fights evil and the criminals who threaten his country as Copperman, thanks to the special armor given to him by the local blacksmith.

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: Toubab
programme.desc: Soon after being released from prison, Babtou gets in trouble with the law again. Facing deportation to his foreign birthplace he’s never been to, he and his friend Dennis are willing to do anything to stay in the only home they've ever known: Frankfurt.

programme.title: Murders in Porquerolles
programme.desc: The lifeless body of a painter is found on a beach in Porquerolles. Her body at the foot of the cliff evokes the Lycastre, the famous dragon from the legend that gave the bay its name. A rigid prosecutor and a whimsical policewoman team up to investigate.

programme.title: To My Beloved
programme.desc: Fernando is a good man who takes care of his only child, Daniel. Following the death of his wife Ana, every night Fernando recalls their love as he sorts out his beloved dead spouse’s belongings. One day he finds a VHS tape that will change everything.

programme.title: SAF
programme.desc: Desperate, Kamil takes a low wage job in Istanbul's urbanization project. In so doing, he displaces a Syrian refugee and partakes in his neighborhood’s destruction, while also needing to pay for the required permits. One day, Kamil suddenly disappears.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: When a U.S. Army deserter is granted asylum over claims of evidence of an alleged U.S. torture prison in the Czech Republic, Karla’s position as the new German ambassador in Prague is threatened. In order to find the truth, she is willing to risk it all.

programme.title: Go Youth!
programme.desc: Four teenagers, each with unique dreams, passions, and fears, attempt to navigate through the contemporary adult world of Mexico City. The pursuit of their youthful ideals is met with setbacks along the way as we follow in their journey.

programme.title: Governance
programme.desc: Renzo, a brilliant and unscrupulous manager is forced to quit his position as general manager of an oil group after an investigation for corruption. Convinced that a young colleague betrayed him, he plots his revenge, but the situation gets out of hand.

programme.title: Traces of Sandalwood
programme.desc: Adopted and living in Spain for years, a young woman returns to Mumbai to discover her roots, accompanied by a handsome Indian guide whom she romances.

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: A junior overhears some juicy gossip, but when she attempts to retell it, she falls flat and bores her audience. Frustrated with her lacklustre storytelling skills, a group of seniors take it upon themselves to teach her the art of gossiping.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: A Wicked Game
programme.desc: A violent assault on a German tourist pits Ambassador Karla Lorenz against friends and fellow diplomats as she tries to discover who is behind this and a string of other attacks on young women in the city.
